verbs.description: [V: hate] [ARG1: crimes] continue to rise in la county report finds hate crimes increased by 5 percent in 2017 in los angeles county compared to the prior year continuing a four - year upward trend that has seen a 32 percent jump in such incidents according to a report released los angeles county california u s crimes la county los angeles county executive director county commission on human relations robin toma
